description: Creative Enzymes is widely known as the expert in enzyme stabilization. More specifically, we dedicate resources and technologies to perform custom services targeted at improvement in enzyme properties and activities, tailored to the need of customer. An advanced approach to stabilize enzymes is to use ionic liquid (ILs) or polymer coatings, which requires both theoretical knowledge and practical experiences.
name: Ionic Liquid and Polymer Coating for Enzyme Stabilization
